Package com.ibm.vie.mazerunner.squares

Class Lava

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.vie.mazerunner.squares.Space
com.ibm.vie.mazerunner.squares.Lava
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISquare
public class Lava extends Space
A square full of lava is difficult to traverse. Lava costs 61 steps to navigate.
